content: When purchasing a single-model coding agent, companies are implicitly betting on that model provider consistently offering both the best agent and the best model for coding over a significant period.
The top-performing coding model changes frequently, with different models like Codex 5.3, Opus 4.6, Gemini 3 Pro, Sonnet 4.5, and GPT-4 each holding the lead at various times.
Open-weight models are expected to significantly impact the industry in the coming years by reducing costs while maintaining effectiveness comparable to frontier models.
Coupling a coding agent with a specific model limits optionality as new, potentially more cost-effective models become available.
